list-item.p: Patients with severe coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) present with lymphocytopenia and T-cell exhaustion.
Persistent stimulation by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 leads to the inhibition of the immune system.
Immune blockade in patients with cancer supports host protective immunity.
Immune checkpoint inhibitors safely restore immunocompetence in sepsis and viral infections.
Immunostimulants should be considered as the first-line option in severe COVID-19.
